sn1.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn1.1:4.3: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn1.1:4.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn1.1:4.8: “Yathākathaṃ pana tvaṃ, mārisa, appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatarī”ti?
sn1.1:4.10: yadāsvāhaṃ, āvuso, āyūhāmi tadāssu nibbuyhāmi.
sn1.1:4.11: Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, appatiṭṭhaṃ anāyūhaṃ oghamatarin”ti.
sn1.1:6.4: “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
